>
[Bloodline Focus](/Feats.aspx?ID=621) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 201 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
bloodline spell

</column>

---

Your focus recovers faster. If you have spent at least 2 Focus Points since the last time you Refocused, you recover 2 Focus Points when you Refocus instead of 1.

<title level="2">Bloodline Focus leads to...</title>
[Bloodline Wellspring](/Feats.aspx?ID=628)
